name: SMB1 Malory Towers Edition
description:
WOW! This is my Mushroom Kingdom Fusion Creepypasta Game. It's SMB1 Malory Towers Edition. This fangame is made for the Luigikid EXE Challenge 2.

Every copy of Super Mario Bros is personalized

Every copy of Super Mario Bros 1 is personalized

Every copy of Super Mario All-Stars is personalized
